Kyiv Optionality Map.name: Kyiv Optionality Map
Kyiv Optionality Map.desc: This is a map of the Kyiv region that displays the open restaurants, bars, and other places in the city. The map is interactive, allowing users to filter restaurants by cuisine, price, and rating. The map was designed in Figma and implemented using React.js, Mapbox GL, and Tailwind CSS.

Typed.name: Typed
Typed.desc: This is a Typeracing game designed to test and improve typing skills. I implemented features such as word accuracy validation and a words-per-minute calculator. The website was designed in Figma and developed using React.js, JavaScript, modular CSS, and APIs. The game is hosted on Vercel.
